fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each night, receive a random ability from any roles created by the game's host prior to it starting. You gain its attack and defense values, and are able to use any available abilities.
- Should the host have fewer than 5 created roles to choose from, this will default to choosing from either Nub's or Rasen's roles, as determined by the host.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role may spawn in any evil faction slot. It will inherit any attributes exclusive to the faction.
- Town Investigative abilities will return results as if you are Beta Tester (4317). Other investigative abilities will know that you are Alpha Tester (4318).
